title: Slow AI Curriculum 2026: The Critical Literacy Repository
subtitle: A central dashboard providing the webinar links and administrative documents required for the 2026 certification programme.
author: Dr Sam Illingworth
content_html:
This post serves as the central repository for The Slow AI Curriculum for Critical Literacy 2026. Scholars should bookmark this page for use throughout the twelve-month programme. It contains the live webinar links, the syllabus archive, and key contact information.

Read more
